home.self-intro: I am a front-end developer/graphic designer

about.title: About Me
about.self-intro: Hello! I'm Jeff Liu Yu-Wei, a Computer Science student at the National University of Singapore.
about.self-intro2: I have experience in the front end development and I am currently expanding my skill set by working on personal projects that integrate both front-end and back-end technologies.
about.self-intro3: In my free time, I am also taking on coding challenges to improve on my coding skills. Beyond programming, I am exploring the creative worlds of graphic design and 3D modeling, with aspirations to dive into VR and AR in the near future.
about.self-intro4: I am fluent in 3 languages: English, Chinese and Japanese (JLPT (Japanese Level Proficiency Test) N2 certified)), and I am ambitiously working towards achieving JLPT N1.
